Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity:

Text.Language: Pihi/b m~m/i n~te V] v~iwt a~riounai neman qen tekmetouro
O True Lamb of God the Father, have mercy upon us in Your kingdom.

Text.Language: Je aumici nan n~oua~lou: au] nan n~ous/ri: v/et e~retefar,/: ,/ hijen tefnahbi

Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Nativity:

Text.Language: <ere B/yleem: t~polic n~nip~rov/t/c: y/etaumec Pi,~rictoc n~q/tc: pimahc~nau n~Adam.
Hail to Bethlehem, the city of the prophets, in which Christ was born, the Second Adam.
